analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/43/0x98a6d8a22acc4e67bac000d975bd392338d9068a.sol:
	Contract RedBlue has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/43/0x98a6d8a22acc4e67bac000d975bd392338d9068a.sol#202-203)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/43/0x98a6d8a22acc4e67bac000d975bd392338d9068a.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/43/0x98a6d8a22acc4e67bac000d975bd392338d9068a.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/43/0x98a6d8a22acc4e67bac000d975bd392338d9068a.sol#72-73) is not in mixedCase
